Pimpinan Komisi I DPR RI Janji Fokuskan Kesejahteraan Prajurit TNI
02 Nov 2019, 09:12 by syariful alam


Pimpinan Komisi I DPR RI Janji Fokuskan Kesejahteraan Prajurit TNI

KBRN, Jakarta : Wakil Ketua Komisi I DPR RI dari Fraksi Partai Gerindra Bambang Kristiono mengatakan akan menfokuskan dalam pembahasan dan peningkatan kesejahteraan prajurit TNI. Menurut Bambang, sebagai pimpinan Komisi I DPR RI yang secara hati nurani dan pribadi mengalami bagaimana rasanya menjadi prajurit TNI.
“Kalau target saya akan menfokuskan peningkatan kesejahteraan prajurit,” kata Bambang, Sabtu (11/2/2019).
Untuk mewujudkan hal tersebut, dirinya akan bertemu dan meminta arahan serta petunjuk dari Ketua Umum Partai Gerindra Prabowo Subianto terkait target untuk memasukkan regulasi peningkatan kesejahteraan prajurit TNI.
“Saya akan bertemu dan meminta arahan ketua umum.”
Komisi I DPR RI pekan lalu telah melakukan rapat internal terkait dengan program-program dan target legislasi yang akan dibahas Komisi I DPR RI.
Dikatakan Wakil Ketua Komisi I DPR RI Bambang Kristiono, dalam rapat internal terdapat sembilan program dan target komisi yang dibahas di komisi yang membidangi pertahanan, luar negeri, komunikasi dan informatika, dan intelijen tersebut.

House of Representatives Commission I Chairperson Promises to Focus on the Welfare of TNI Soldiers
02 Nov 2019, 09:12 by syariful alam


House of Representatives Commission I Chairperson Promises to Focus on the Welfare of TNI Soldiers

KBRN, Jakarta: Deputy Chairman of Commission I of the Indonesian Parliament from the Gerindra Party Faction Bambang Kristiono said that he would focus on the discussion and improvement of the welfare of TNI soldiers. According to Bambang, as the head of the House of Representatives Commission I who conscientiously and personally experienced what it was like to be a TNI soldier.
"If the target I will focus on improving the welfare of soldiers," said Bambang, Saturday (02/11/2019).
To realize this, he will meet and ask for direction and guidance from the General Chairman of the Gerindra Party Prabowo Subianto regarding the target to include regulations for increasing the welfare of TNI soldiers.
"I will meet and ask for the chairman's direction."
The House of Representatives Commission I last week held an internal meeting related to the programs and legislation targets that will be discussed by the House of Representatives Commission I.
The Deputy Chairperson of the Indonesian House of Representatives Commission I Bambang Kristiono said, in an internal meeting there were nine programs and commission targets discussed at the commission in charge of defense, foreign affairs, communication and information technology, and intelligence.
